comment:
I will defend to the end anyone's right to have a baby out of wedlock. I think many people would. 
What I don't like, apart from AH herself, and the fact she now has a baby who is utterly dependent on her, is that she couldn't help herself; she had to use the announcement as another platform to defend her views on something, that quite frankly, isn't really that radical anymore. In my view, a baby announcement should be something joyful and all about sharing this blessing. Not what she did, she used her baby and her announcement for her own agenda. 
Amber failed at the first hurdle.
